hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### A utility. This one you'll need to edit the PHP file and enter wich taxon file you want to process. Not part of operation. #php gen_higherClass.php
### This will remove MoF and Occurrence records where occurrence!taxonID does not exist in taxon.tab #php remove_MoF_for_taxonID.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS", "resource": "remove_MoF_for_taxonID", "resource_name": ""}' #OK ### will generate WoRMS_cleaned.tar.gz #cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 #cp WoRMS_cleaned.tar.gz WoRMS.tar.gz #ls -lt WoRMS_cleaned.tar.gz #ls -lt WoRMS.tar.gz #rm -f WoRMS_cleaned.tar.gz #cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### This will add higherClassification in taxon.tab and rebuild the DwCA. With carry-over of other extensions. ### No parentID but has ancestry, though limited still. #php dwca_utility.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS", "task": "gen_hC_using_ancestry"}'
### This use gnparser one name at a time. Not entire file. #php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS-with-hC"}' #gen neo4j_1
### Start matching taxa #php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS-with-hC"}' #gen neo4j_2
### Convert taxon.tab, use EOLid value for taxonID. ### REMINDER: Multiple scinames with different taxonIDs have the same canonical thus will have the same EOLid #php use_EOLid_as_taxonID.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS-with-hC"}' # gen neo4j_3
### rename #cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 #cp WoRMS-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz WoRMS_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz #ls -lt WoRMS-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz #ls -lt WoRMS_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz #rm -f WoRMS-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz
### Generate CSV files for Neo4j: OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors php generate_csv_4neo4j.php _ '{"resource_id": "WoRMS_TraitBank_1_0"}' #latest
